name: Classic Margherita Pizza
description: Fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, and olive oil on a classic crust.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: Spicy pepperoni slices topped with mozzarella and tomato sauce.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Grilled chicken, BBQ sauce, red onions, and cheddar cheese.

name: Veggie Supreme Pizza
description: Bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, olives, and tomatoes on a tomato base.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing, parmesan, and croutons.

name: Greek Salad
description: Mixed greens with feta cheese, olives, tomatoes, and cucumbers.

name: Garden Salad
description: Fresh seasonal greens with carrots, cucumbers, and vinaigrette.

name: Grilled Salmon Fillet
description: Fresh Atlantic salmon grilled to perfection with herbs and lemon.

name: Ribeye Steak
description: Juicy ribeye steak cooked to your liking, served with vegetables.

name: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
description: Creamy alfredo sauce tossed with fettuccine and grilled chicken.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Mixed vegetables stir-fried in soy sauce with garlic and ginger.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey chocolate center, served with vanilla ice cream.

name: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone.

name: Cheesecake
description: Rich and creamy cheesecake with a graham cracker crust.

name: Lemon Sorbet
description: Refreshing lemon-flavored frozen dessert, perfect palate cleanser.

name: Espresso
description: Strong and rich espresso shot, prepared fresh.

name: Herbal Tea
description: A selection of calming herbal teas.

name: Latte
description: Espresso mixed with steamed milk for a creamy texture.

name: Fresh Orange Juice
description: Freshly squeezed orange juice served chilled.
